de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.servlets.rest.bookshelves

Class BookshelfResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.servlets.rest.bookshelves.BookshelfResource

  • @Path(value="/bookshelves")
public class BookshelfResource
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BookshelfResource() 
      BookshelfResource(UserBean userBean, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SuccessMessage addItemToUserBookshelf(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String pi)
      Adds a new BookshelfItem with the given pi to the current users bookshelf with the given id Returns 203 if no matching bookshelf was found or 400 if the BookshelfItem could not be created (wrong pi)
      SuccessMessage addItemToUserBookshelf(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String pi, java.lang.String logId, java.lang.String pageString)
      Adds a new BookshelfItem with the given pi, logid and page number to the current users bookshelf with the given id Returns 203 if no matching bookshelf was found or 400 if the BookshelfItem could not be created (wrong pi/logid/page)
      SuccessMessage addToSessionBookshelf(java.lang.String pi)
      Adds an item with the given pi to the session stored bookshelf, creating a new bookshelf if needed
      SuccessMessage addToSessionBookshelf(java.lang.String pi, java.lang.String logId, java.lang.String pageString)
      Adds an item with the given pi, logid and page number to the session stored bookshelf, creating a new bookshelf if needed
      SuccessMessage addUserBookshelf()
      Adds a new Bookshelf with the given name to the current users bookshelves
      SuccessMessage addUserBookshelf(java.lang.String name)
      Adds a new Bookshelf with the given name to the current users bookshelves
      SuccessMessage addUserBookshelfFromSession()
      Adds the current session bookshelf to the current user bookshelves under a newly generated name
      SuccessMessage addUserBookshelfFromSession(java.lang.String bookshelfName)
      Adds the current session bookshelf to the current user bookshelves under the given name
      java.lang.Integer countSessionBookshelfItems()
      Counts the items contained in the session store bookshelf and returns the number as plain integer If no session store bookshelf exists, 0 is returned
      java.lang.Long countUserBookshelfItems(java.lang.Long id)
      Counts the items contained in the current user's bookshelf with the given id and returns the number as plain integer If no session store bookshelf exists, 0 is returned
      SuccessMessage deleteFromSessionBookshelf(java.lang.String pi)
      Deletes the bookshelf item with the given pi from the session store bookshelf This operation returns an object with the property "success: false" if the operation failed (usually because the object wasn't in the bookshelf to begin with).
      SuccessMessage deleteFromSessionBookshelf(java.lang.String pi, java.lang.String logId, java.lang.String pageString)
      Deletes the bookshelf item with the given pi, logid and page number from the session store bookshelf This operation returns an object with the property "success: false" if the operation failed (usually because the object wasn't in the bookshelf to begin with).
      SuccessMessage deleteFromUserBookshelf(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String pi)
      Removes a BookshelfItem with the given pi from the current users bookshelf with the given id Returns 203 if no matching bookshelf was found or 400 if the requested BookshelfItem is invalid (wrong pi)
      SuccessMessage deleteFromUserBookshelf(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String pi, java.lang.String logId, java.lang.String pageString)
      Removes a BookshelfItem with the given pi, logid and page number from the current users bookshelf with the given id Returns 203 if no matching bookshelf was found or 400 if the requested BookshelfItem is invalid (wrong pi/logid/page)
      SuccessMessage deleteSessionBookshelf()
      Deletes the entiry bookshelf from the session store.
      SuccessMessage deleteUserBookshelf(java.lang.Long id)
      Deletes the current user's bookshelf with the given id.
      java.util.List<Bookshelf> getAllPublicBookshelfs()
      Returns all public Bookshelves
      java.util.List<Bookshelf> getAllSharedBookshelfs()
      Returns all Bookshelves shared to the current user and not owned by him
      java.util.List<Bookshelf> getAllUserBookshelfs()
      Returns all Bookshelves owned by the current user
      java.util.List<Bookshelf> getContainingUserBookshelves(java.lang.String pi)
      Returns the bookshelf containing the object with the given pi if is contained in any bookshelf of the current user Otherwise an json object with the property "success:false" is returned
      java.util.List<Bookshelf> getContainingUserBookshelves(java.lang.String pi, java.lang.String logId, java.lang.String pageString)
      Returns the bookshelf containing the object with the given pi, logid and page number if is contained in any bookshelf of the current user Otherwise an json object with the property "success:false" is returned
      java.lang.Integer getPageOrder(java.lang.String pageString) 
      Bookshelf getSessionBookshelf()
      Returns the session stored bookshelf, creating a new empty one if needed
      Bookshelf getUserBookshelfById(java.lang.Long id)
      Returns the bookshelf with the given id, provided it is owned by the user or it is public or shared to him
      boolean isInGroup(User user, UserGroup group) 
      java.lang.Boolean isInSessionBookshelf(java.lang.String pi)
      Returns "true" if the object with the given IP is in the session store bookshelf, "false" otherwise
      java.lang.Boolean isInSessionBookshelf(java.lang.String pi, java.lang.String logId, java.lang.String pageString)
      Returns "true" if the object with the given IP, logid and page number is in the session store bookshelf, "false" otherwise
      SuccessMessage setUserBookshelfName(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name of the Bookshelf with the given id to the given name - provided the user owns such a bookshelf; otherwise 204 is returned

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • deleteFromSessionBookshelf

        @GET
 @Path(value="/session/delete/{pi}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public SuccessMessage deleteFromSessionBookshelf(@PathParam(value="pi")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String pi)
                                                                                                                         throws DAOException,
                                                                                                                                java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                                                RestApiException
        Deletes the bookshelf item with the given pi from the session store bookshelf This operation returns an object with the property "success: false" if the operation failed (usually because the object wasn't in the bookshelf to begin with). Otherwise the return object contains "success: true"
        Parameters:
        pi -
        Returns:
        an object containing the boolean property 'success', detailing wether the operation was successfull

        DAOException
        java.io.IOException

      • deleteUserBookshelf

        @GET
 @Path(value="/user/delete/{id}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public SuccessMessage deleteUserBookshelf(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.Long id)
                                                                                                               throws DAOException,
                                                                                                                      java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                                      RestApiException
        Deletes the current user's bookshelf with the given id. If no such bookshelf could be found a message with 'success:false' is returned, otherwise one with 'success:true'
        Parameters:
        id - The bookshelf id
        Returns:
        an object containing the boolean property 'success', detailing wether the operation was successfull
        Throws:
        DAOException
        java.io.IOException
        RestApiException - if no current user was found
